issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement SQL metrics framework
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12402](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12402). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As a user, I would like the ability to inspect metrics for an executed plan to help with debugging and performance tuning.

comments.body:
